entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:19 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 11:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries or ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to rain or freezing rain near noon. Fog patches in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to snow in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
